text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 20.1. Taahaa 20.2. Hum ney yeh quran tujh per iss liye nahi utara kay tu mushaqqat mein parr jaye 20.3. Bulkay uss ki naseehat kay liye jo Allah say darta hai 20.4. Iss ka utarna uss ki taraf say hai jiss ney zamin ko aur buland aasmano ko peda kiya hai
